item.title: (X) things I always Google while making ggplot 2 graphs
item.description:
How do I change the font size of the axis labels?

No one likes axis labels that are ridiculously small in comparsion to the rest of the graph. To change the font size of your axis labels using ggplot2,

‘’’{r} ’’'
